game.name: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Step into a dark reimagination of Arthurian legends in this first person, open world RPG. Explore a world stuck in everlasting autumn, witness falling legends and make meaningful choices woven into a complex, branching storyline.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into a dark reimagination of Arthurian legends in this first person, open world RPG. Explore a world stuck in everlasting autumn, witness falling legends and make meaningful choices woven into a complex, branching storyline.

reviewHighlights.text: 한글 패치 믿고삿느데 한글패치안됨... 여기 제작사에서 막는 건가,,ㅜㅜ
